verbose_text: Nrd1 also interacts with Rpo21 Rpb1 (the largest subunit of RNAPII) early in the transcription cycle, thus restricting Sen1 dependent termination to short transcription units.
evidence: Nrd1 also interacts with Rpo21 Rpb1  (the largest subunit of RNAPII) early in the transcription cycle              , thus restricting Sen1-dependent termination to short transcription
